net.line.lcn.upm
Interface UPMUpdateAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
javax.ejb.EJBObject, java.rmi.Remote
public interface UPMUpdateAdaptor
extends java.rmi.Remote, javax.ejb.EJBObject

The UPMUpdateAdaptor is the countpart for UPMAdaptor which is a read-only connection adaptor to UPM service.  For UPMUpdateAdaptor, it will allow the updates done against the LDAP server behind. 

Right now, there are 4 methods provided to create objects, 4 to update, and 4 to delete.  These methods will take in the data object class, do validation against them, and perform the according operations.  These 12 methods are however a short term solution specificly done for some projects and thus will not be permanent.

updateUser

public void updateUser(java.lang.String currUserID,
                       userObject userObj)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                       UPMException,
                       net.line.lcn.upm.UPMExceptions
Update record according to the object supplied. The method will lookup the original object in LDAP by the primary key supplied. Then update it will the new image. Thus, the primary key can never be changed.
Parameters:
userObj - The new image.
